Talk43:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Kilton...would it be all right if I made more
sculptures? For you, I mean.

Been a while since I've been this excited
about making stuff.
Talk44:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Yaaawheeelalala!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Why, if those aren't the exact words
I wanted to fall into my ears!

Yes, thank you! Thank you, yes!
Talk16:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Ha-hiyeeee!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Why, this monster sculpture... It's more
impressive than I dreamed possible!
Talk45:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Though it would help if you got better
at, you know...describing monsters.
Talk46:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Or maaaybe...somebody...will bring us
another picture of a monster.
Talk47:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yep, it would be a big help if somebody
brought us a picture.
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now, would you find the most-perfect
spot for this sculpture on the <clr:0000>stage<clr:ffff>
over there? Please?
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Pretty sure I said I can't be responsible
for that sort of thing. Too big a decision.
Too much responsibility. Hard pass.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Awww... If only someone would <clr:0000>move it to
the stage<clr:ffff> and place it in a pleasing spot.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>We went to so much trouble to get this
sculpture sculpted.

I want nothing more than to give it the
many looking eyeballs it deserves.
Talk26:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800>Ooh! OOOOOOH!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


It looks so natural here and so realistic
too! It's as if we've stumbled on a
monster's lair.
Yes, it's exactly what I was hoping for!
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Even I could swear I see the wind ruffling
its coat.
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>A magnificent picture-painting indeed.
And yes, that is very truly a monster!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Just...one teensy problem. It isn't a
Horriblin.

A <clr:0000>Horriblin<clr:ffff> has an astonishing patch of
fur on its back like OOOHWOW, while its
adorable hands are big like VWOOSH!
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Everyone in the village seemed to like it,
so I could probably make more.
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Yes! Now we must put it in front of every
face in the village.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Haarooo! Really?!


In that case, I implore you to make a
Horriblin next.

<clr:0000>Horriblins<clr:ffff> have big hands like VWOOSH
and a coat that's quite OOHWOW! They
also enjoy swinging from the ceiling.
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hear ye, hear ye! Come, look see!


I present to you a new species of monster
called the Horriblin.

Do not fear, draw near! This is the
only place you can safely admire such
a creature up close. The only place!
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. Your description...<sp:5:0:0>no...<sp:5:0:0>I still don't
know what it looks like.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry. So sorry! I am an awful describer
of things.

I would draw you a <clr:0000>detailed picture<clr:ffff> of a
Horriblin if I could. But there is no art to
be found in the bones of my body.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But fret not! I, Kilton, will describe the
monster to you with much fervor and
many times over. Surely that will help!
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ahem. This sight has stolen your eyes.
Now, give me your ears! All of them!

Once again, this monster is the lovable
Horriblin.

This new monster was discovered
in caves created by the Upheaval.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>And what a stylish monster it is!
See how its colorful hair sprouts from
its tough skin!
You feel the urge to reach out and ruffle
its locks, don't you? Yes! I feel that very
same feeling so very much!
And yet, it might be best to keep your
hands to yourself...if you want to keep
your hands at all, that is.
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Eh, well, <sp:5:0:0>it would be better if I had
a <clr:0000>detailed picture <clr:ffff>to look at.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What I'm saying is...


A <clr:0000>Horriblin<clr:ffff> has a colorful coat like
OOOH WOW and a charming,
droopy snout.
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Its hands are big like VWOOSH! Yes,
and it dangles from the ceiling too.
0006: I found a nice spot for it.
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Look and learn! Then you won't hate!
Understand what you fear and you'll
feel great!
For those with an open mind, wonders
always await!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm. I'm trying, but I can't picture what
it's supposed to look like.

Without a <clr:0000>detailed picture <clr:ffff>of that
<clr:0000>Horriblin<clr:ffff> thing, I'm not sure what
I can do.
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you! Thank you!


Again I find myself in your debt.


Please, allow me to give you a gift to
show my gratitude.
Talk65:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>But look at that! Your pouch is full to 
the tip of the top!

I've got a dish and some monster extract
to give you, but first you'll have to make
room to carry it.
Talk08:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huu...<sp:5:1:0>hayaaah!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


Th-that's it exactly! That is the Horriblin
I adore!
Talk37:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>This dish is a specialty of mine. I hope
your mouth enjoys it!

The homemade seasoning I gave you last
time gives it its secret flavor. Since you're
here, I'll give you another bottle!
Talk66:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Hooyagee?! <sp:5:0:0>I was going to give you a
gift of thanks, but your pouch is full to
the brim.
Make some room in there and I'll give
you the dish and monster extract I have
waiting for you.
Talk38:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>You may wonder what use you could
have for such a thing,<sp:5:1:0> but I promise
it's quite handy.
For so long I've dreamed of collecting
these sculptures and showing the world
how wonderful monsters truly are.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>And now that dream is coming true...
all because of you! Thank you!
Thank you many times again!
Talk39:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ahh...<sp:5:1:0> If only I had a <clr:0000>detailed picture<clr:ffff>
of a Horriblin...
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, now this is a good picture! Let me
use it for reference, and I can make the
sculpture, no problem.
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If I had that picture, the sculpture would
be son and done. But...I can't force you.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All right, just leave it to me. I'll have it
made, son and done!
